short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for ChatGPT with Advanced features like, Speech-to-Text, Pick Text, Saved Prompt, Prefix & Suffix prompts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Advanced features like 
- Speech to text with chatGPT
- Save frequently used prompts
- Set the saved prompts as your prompt prefix or suffix.


USE CASES:

No more switching tabs to ask questions, No more repeated prompts.
Assist during tests, Interviews. 

Can't copy from site?  
Don't worry, User "Selection Tool" and grab contents

Tired of typing ?
Use "Speech-To-Text" tool

Have repeating prompts ?
Use
- Saved Prompts
- Prefix Prompt
- Suffix Prompt

You love it ?
Please share it with your friends, twitter, Linkedin and other social media
